pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, July 12, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister, along with the Minister of Public Services and Procurement Anita Anand, will virtually meet with volunteers from the This Is Our Shot campaign, a movement aimed at rallying Canadians and encouraging them to replace vaccine hesitancy with confidence in order to end the pandemic.

Closed to media.
